item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1105; 05:10PM; 3219 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FeyKq3; Arlington Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. The approximately 75' x 75' unit housed an auto parts/body shop. Crews contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending the two adjacent units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E215 E226 E229 E29 E94 RA26 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1105; 04:47PM; 3219 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FeyKq3; Arlington Heights; One story row of commercial units with heavy fire showing from one unit. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E29 SQ21 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1176; 04:55PM; 4201 N Via Marisol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e69Gpc; Montecito Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 19 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is mixed garden style and center hall. Crews contained the fire to the kitchen in the fire unit. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E47 RA47 T12; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1176; 04:43PM; 4201 N Via Marisol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e69Gpc; Montecito Heights; Three story apartments over parking with smoke and fire showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E47 RA47 T12; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0801; 01:00PM; 13730 W Desmond St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ElVB1L; Pacoima; The first responding fire company is handling the RV fire. There is no extension into the commercial building and no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0801; 12:48PM; 13730 W Desmond St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ElVB1L; Pacoima; Large RV well involved in fire, exposing a row of commercial units. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0592; 10:56AM; 829 W Hamilton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EaPH34; San Pedro; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews held the fire to the garage, preventing it from extending into the attic or attached home. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E248 E36 RA848 T48; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0592; 10:45AM; 829 W Hamilton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3snruoh; San Pedro; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing from the attached garage. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E248 T48; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0550; 10:38AM; 6105 W Drexel Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E2NneE; Mid-Wilshire; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes. Firefighters rescued one dog from the 2 story unit and are providing medical support. Condition is unknown at this time. The primary and secondary search located no other occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E229 E261 E29 E58 E68 RA68 RA861 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0550; 10:20AM; 6105 W Drexel Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E2NneE; Mid-Wilshire; Two story apartment building with fire showing from one unit on the first floor. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 E229 E261 E29 E58 E68 RA68 RA861 T29 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
